Index >  ChangeImageSize

ChangeImageSize()

Description

Changes the size of an image specified by index.

Syntax

.ChangeImageSize(sImageIndex, lNewwidth, lnewheight, newInterpolationMethod);

Parameters

<short> sImageIndex: specifies the index of the image to be converted. The index is 0-based.
<int> iNewWidth: specifies the new width.
<int> iNewHeight: specifies the new height.
EnumDWT_InterpolationMethod newInterpolationMethod: specifies the algorithm used to do interpolation.
Allowed Values Interpolation Method
1 EnumDWT_InterpolationMethod.IM_NEARESTNEIGHBOUR
2 EnumDWT_InterpolationMethod.IM_BILINEAR
3 EnumDWT_InterpolationMethod.IM_BICUBIC

Return value

bool

true indicates success. false indicates failure.

Remarks

When false is returned, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.
